amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of those amendments contained in House Report 108-206 which are printed on pages H6797-H6807 in the Congressional Record for July 15, 2003.
amendment.purpose: Amendments numbered 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 18, as modified, 19, 20, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25, as modified, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31, 34, 35, 36, 38, as modified, 30, 40, and 42 printed in House Report 108-206.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hyde amendments (A011) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Hyde amendments (A011) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments (A011) offered by Mr. Hyde.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hyde amendments (A011) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
